name: MoonManJump
description:
- Fly as far as you can without hitting a pipe or asteroid.

- Keep pressing SPACEBAR to maintain flight.

- Left click to fire weapon

- Press the SPACEBAR to get start the game.

- Asteroids should spawn around the 11-16 point mark.

My second Unity game! Since I'm still a beginner, I figure I should start out making the simple stuff. This game is largely based off a popular game I'm sure you're familiar with, so the gameplay should immediately be familiar to you. The big hurdle i had was getting the Asteroids to spawn properly. So pardon me if they're a bit off. Other than that, the game could maybe use more time in the oven so I might update it every now and then. but i think its current state is serviceable.  

oh yea and Thanks for playing!
